name: Timbob Jones
text: Barely any sauce on my pizza . It was more or less just cheese bread !

name: Matt H
text: While I was staying at a local hotel for a family wedding, I decided to order delivery from Hungry Howie's. The pizza was good & I was satisfied with my purchase and the delivery time.

name: ARVIN
text: Nice small town place to eat pizza close to port Huron

name: Bailey Hammond
text: Horrible service. Driver wasn't wearing a face mask at all. We ordered the cookie and it wasn't even cooked all the way. Called to complain and they were rude and short and said they knew for a fact the cookie was cooked all the way.

name: Terryn Duckworth
text: Cheryl was super helpful and greatly appreciate her time and effort!

name: Corey Sanger
text: It was great tasting food. Made to order, paid close attention to special requests

name: Daniel King
text: There pizza has gone down hill. Now more greasy then little ceasers hotn readys

text: Food is always good and quality. Never had a problem. Staff is always friendly and smiling.

text: Love the seasoned crust.. my favorite pizza place.

name: Jon Scott
text: Great pizza. I’m surprised I don’t see more of these around.

text: Hungry howies is always my go to pizza company. They have awesome flacored crust. Who doesnt want a good crust?

name: Demetrius Gibson
text: Never heard of this place before visiting my buddy in Port Huron. I tried them once and they immediately became my go to pizza spot while I was in town. …More

name: Krysten Allen
text: Update: I was contacted by the manager and she was very polite and nice. I understand that things can get messed up and was very appreciative of her taking the time to call and apologize. …More

text: Still one of the best around. Good deals and the flavoured crusts are great.

name: Haley
text: The lady handed me the wrong food and she also gave me a warm pop, she definetly didnt know what she was doing.

name: Drew Hohmann
text: Can't remember the last time I was unsatisfied. Take the fifth star, you sonsaguns.

name: Aj Rasner
text: Was visiting relatives nearby and ordered pizza and a steak sub. Food was good and hot and the delivery driver Jacob was funny and personable, definitely recommend Howie's!

name: Pork chop Express
text: Hecks yea.....the calzones are gr8

name: Jose A. Mendoza
text: This place has always been great! Staff was fast and friendly. Always my go to Hungry Howies when I'm in town.

name: Leon McHugh
text: Staff will cuss you out and **steal** money from you on billing you for things you didnt buy. Then you will call corporate who will give you franchisee details who will then ignore you no matter how many messages you leave. Worst business I've ever come across.

name: Diane karnes
text: Omg best pizza ever. Get the buttered garlic crust. Yum yum.

name: DJ ILLEE
text: 2 times in a row I order pizza for delivery. 1st time they took an hour and 15 minutes to deliver after saying it would be 25-45 minutes. I tip the driver well because I know they’re busy. Not a big deal. Order another pizza about a week …More

name: Nov111805
text: I received birthday coupons from this location of Hungry Howies but I live near another one.  I decided since in the past I was not happy with the pies at the store closer to me I would go a few miles out of my way to the Stone Street store …More

name: Rachel Strohmer
text: Ordered a turkey sub and they gave me a soggy sub with pepperonis on it

name: colton leffler
text: Bad restaurant wated 10 minits to get our order taken in the meanwhile the staff argued who had to take our order. The lady that served us was incredibly rude and acted like we were bothering her and wasting her time. She also slamed our …More

name: Drew G
text: I went howies last night on stone street and it was terrible. I know now why i have not ate there in over 10 years. I ordered steak sub and got sick so did my mom it tasted spoiled. Howies really lost it compared to 10 years ago. I will never eat there again..HUNGRY HOWIES YOUR FOOD SUCKS..

name: Andrew Wiseley
text: $1 spot for a fast meal in todays day of "age".   These people pretty good with dellvery.  My favorite is to sit down inside and eat and think to myself.  I could do school work in this spot no problem!

text: The team here is always friendly and welcoming. They always have good deals and they have yummy stuffed crusts now.

text: I was there only one.  I ordered a pizza on my was home from babysitting.  Cost $13+.  I ordered, was there 5 minutes later, but before I made it out the door a worker came out, thrust pizza in my hands, then disappeared with my change. …More

text: Disappointed in their services. Called them to let them know they got my order wrong(again)only for them to come back an hour later with cold food that wasn't fully cooked.

name: AJ M
text: Quick service, easily to spot from the road as well as many options, pizza is usually well done and customer service although not excellent is better than some other places. All around good pizza with many options to customize as well as online ordering available.
